mapper.select: select case when sum(io.I_money) is null then 0 else sum(io.I_money) end as sumMoney from inout io join asset ass on io.A_seq=ass.A_seq where io.I_date >= to_date(#{selectDate}, 'YYYY/MM/dd') and io.I_date < to_date(#{selectDate}, 'YYYY/MM/dd')+7 and ass.M_id=#{M_id} and io.C_inout=#{inoutCode}
